description: Allows for the control of the alarm system.

alarmSystemStatus.label: alarm system status
alarmSystemStatus.description: Current status of the alarm system

away.description: The alarm system is in "away" mode

off.description: The alarm system is in "off" mode

stay.description: The alarm system is in "stay" mode

sendEvent(alarmSystemStatus,off).description: Set the alarm system to "off" mode

sendEvent(alarmSystemStatus,stay).description: Set the alarm system to "stay" mode

sendEvent(alarmSystemStatus,away).description: Set the alarm system to "away" mode
